"Victoria": "Okay! Now then, I'll teach you about Line Strike."
"Line Strike is what you'd call a \"card battle\" type of game."
"You can use up to 15 cards in total."
"You'll have to prepare yourself a deck before you start playin', of course."
"And wouldn't you know it, I've whipped up a Basic Deck all ready to go for ya!"
"Feel free to check it out at your own leisure."
"Now, here are the rules of Line Strike."
"Cards are placed on three lines, and players compete for the total strength of each line."
"Each line has a \"base\" set up, and..."
"...Well, actually, it's much easier to learn by playing it yourself rather than have it explained to you."
